scripts.build:main: npm link @tsy-link/utils && npm link @tsy-link/pkg && npm run build --prefix=./main
scripts.compile:pkg: npm link @tsy-link/utils && npm run compile --prefix=./packages/pkg && cd packages/pkg && npm link
scripts.compile:utils: npm run compile --prefix=./packages/utils && cd packages/utils && npm link
scripts.clean: npm run clean --prefix=./main && npm run clean --prefix=./packages/pkg && npm run clean --prefix=./packages/utils
scripts.wipe: npm run wipe --prefix=./main && npm run wipe --prefix=./packages/pkg && npm run wipe --prefix=./packages/utils
scripts.install: npm i --prefix=./main && npm i --prefix=./packages/pkg && npm i --prefix=./packages/utils
scripts.build: npm run compile:utils && npm run compile:pkg && npm run build:main
scripts.watch: concurrently "npm run build:w:main" "npm run compile:w:pkg" "npm run compile:w:utils"
scripts.init: npm run wipe && npm run install && npm run build
